a:5:{s:1:"d";a:6:{i:0;O:8:"stdClass":47:{s:9:"short_des";N;s:10:"article_id";s:4:"7491";s:12:"article_type";s:6:"events";s:3:"uri";s:95:"11th-oecd-amro-adb-adbi-eria-asian-regional-roundtable-on-macroeconomic-and-structural-policies";s:8:"pub_type";s:1:"0";s:5:"title";s:97:"11TH OECD-AMRO-ADB/ADBI-ERIA  ASIAN REGIONAL ROUNDTABLE on  Macroeconomic and Structural Policies";s:11:"posted_date";s:10:"2023-07-27";s:11:"posted_year";s:4:"2023";s:12:"posted_month";s:1:"7";s:7:"content";s:947:"<p>The OECD-AMRO-ADB/ADBI-ERIA Asian Regional Roundtable convenes leading experts from Asian countries and the OECD to discuss the issues at the fore of recent economic developments in the region. It serves as a platform for knowledge sharing between the OECD, AMRO, ADB/ADBI, ERIA and Emerging Asia&rsquo;s policy makers, as well as academics and the private sector. The roundtable also provides opportunities for dialogue on near-term macroeconomic policies and medium-term growth and development challenges including the linkages between near-term and medium-term issues, current agendas as well as future challenges in Emerging Asian economies.</p><p>This year&rsquo;s roundtable will be hosted by Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia (ERIA), Jakarta. The Roundtable will take place virtually on 27-28 July, 2023.</p><p><strong>Detailed Agenda of the roundtable and registration links will be shared shortly. &nbsp;</strong></p>";s:10:"image_name";s:0:"";s:9:"video_url";s:0:"";s:4:"tags";s:0:"";s:6:"editor";s:0:"";s:6:"author";s:0:"";s:6:"doc_no";s:0:"";s:6:"period";s:0:"";s:14:"article_status";s:1:"0";s:10:"event_time";s:0:"";s:5:"venue";s:12:"Virtual Room";s:5:"major";s:33:"Ms Denise Ann
Ms Prasiwi Ibrahim";s:16:"article_keywords";s:0:"";s:9:"organizer";s:0:"";s:12:"image_name_2";s:0:"";s:10:"start_date";s:10:"2023-07-27";s:8:"end_date";s:10:"2023-07-28";s:8:"keywords";s:2471:"11TH OECD-AMRO-ADB/ADBI-ERIA  ASIAN REGIONAL ROUNDTABLE on  Macroeconomic and Structural Policies 11TH OECD-AMRO-ADB/ADBI-ERIA  ASIAN REGIONAL ROUNDTABLE on  Macroeconomic and Structural Policies The OECD-AMRO-ADB/ADBI-ERIA Asian Regional Roundtable convenes leading experts from Asian countries and the OECD to discuss the issues at the fore of recent economic developments in the region. It serves as a platform for knowledge sharing between the OECD, AMRO, ADB/ADBI, ERIA and Emerging Asia&rsquo;s policy makers, as well as academics and the private sector. The roundtable also provides opportunities for dialogue on near-term macroeconomic policies and medium-term growth and development challenges including the linkages between near-term and medium-term issues, current agendas as well as future challenges in Emerging Asian economies.
This year&rsquo;s roundtable will be hosted by Economic Research Institute for ASEAN and East Asia (ERIA), Jakarta. The Roundtable will take place virtually on 27-28 July, 2023.
Detailed Agenda of the roundtable and registration links will be shared shortly. &nbsp;       Virtual Room Ms Denise Ann
Ms Prasiwi Ibrahim prasiwi.ibrahim@oecd.org   2023-07-27 2023-07-28 2023-07-27 27 July 2023 3202 yluJ 72 72-70-3202 82-70-3202 72-70-3202   gro.dceo@miharbi.iwisarp miharbI iwisarP sM
nnA esineD sM mooR lautriV       ;psbn& .yltrohs derahs eb lliw sknil noitartsiger dna elbatdnuor eht fo adnegA deliateD
.3202 ,yluJ 82-72 no yllautriv ecalp ekat lliw elbatdnuoR ehT .atrakaJ ,)AIRE( aisA tsaE dna NAESA rof etutitsnI hcraeseR cimonocE yb detsoh eb lliw elbatdnuor s;ouqsr&raey sihT
.seimonoce naisA gnigremE ni segnellahc erutuf sa llew sa sadnega tnerruc ,seussi mret-muidem dna mret-raen neewteb segaknil eht gnidulcni segnellahc tnempoleved dna htworg mret-muidem dna seicilop cimonoceorcam mret-raen no eugolaid rof seitinutroppo sedivorp osla elbatdnuor ehT .rotces etavirp eht dna scimedaca sa llew sa ,srekam ycilop s;ouqsr&aisA gnigremE dna AIRE ,IBDA/BDA ,ORMA ,DCEO eht neewteb gnirahs egdelwonk rof mroftalp a sa sevres tI .noiger eht ni stnempoleved cimonoce tnecer fo erof eht ta seussi eht ssucsid ot DCEO eht dna seirtnuoc naisA morf strepxe gnidael senevnoc elbatdnuoR lanoigeR naisA AIRE-IBDA/BDA-ORMA-DCEO ehT seiciloP larutcurtS dna cimonoceorcaM  no ELBATDNUOR LANOIGER NAISA  AIRE-IBDA/BDA-ORMA-DCEO HT11 seiciloP larutcurtS dna cimonoceorcaM  no
